posts.postText: I had a idea in ttt so I asked ben Can I donate ideas for vip? and everyone laughed but still can I donate ideas or dums corpse?
You can say the idea but it doesnt really count as a donation as you were told millions of times on the server .-.
lol @ this dude. you started shooting me then left. fgt

Maybe we can try telling him nicely? LOL.

Sorry Magic we do not give VIP for ideas on ttt additions. We do give VIP for people who actually code and create it, so if you have any skill in that, give it a shot, if not, no sorry.
